Hi everyone,

Torrent works flawlessly.
I've always liked Parallels better than VMWare. 
I mostly use this programs to be able to run a Blu-Ray Clone tool.
Well, with Parallels 7 and OsX Mountain Lion, no problems. 
Using VMWare Fusion 5.0, I still run into the same problems I've always had : REALLY SLOW AND SLUGGISH ACCES to devices (Blu-Ray) and share folders ! 
Makes VMWare almost impossible to use ! 

But that's a really specific need...

Regards.
